        • ammoRecycleBin

          java.util.ArrayList<AmmoTile> ammoRecycleBin

          java.util.ArrayList<AmmoTile> ammoTiles
          Deck of ammo tiles

        • powerups

          java.util.ArrayList<Powerup> powerups
          Deck of powerups

        • powerupsRecycleBin

          java.util.ArrayList<Powerup> powerupsRecycleBin
          List of discarded powerups: every time the powerups deck finishes, it will be refilled with the powerups inside this list

        • weapons

          java.util.ArrayList<Weapon> weapons
          Deck of weapons

          boolean _isActive
          checks if the user is connected

          Character character
          It is a unique character identifying the player during the game.

        • nickname

          java.lang.String nickname
          Nickname of the player.

        • playerBoard

          PlayerBoard playerBoard
          It is the board used to keep track of a player's points, damages, marks during the game.

        • playerHand

          PlayerHand playerHand
          It is the class responsible of handling player's weapons, powerups and cubes used during the game.

        • points

          java.lang.Integer points
          Points achieved during the game.

        • user

          User user
          The user joining the multiplayer game and identified by a unique identifier.

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.PlayerBoard extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • boardColor

          PlayerColor boardColor
          Color corresponding to the player and his character.

        • damage

          java.util.List<PlayerColor> damage
          It is the structure that keeps track of the player's damage points received from other players. It has been implemented using an array of values corresponding to other players' colors.

        • finalFrenzy

          boolean finalFrenzy

        • marks

          java.util.List<PlayerColor> marks
          It is the structure that keeps track of the player's marks received from other players. It has been implemented using an array of values corresponding to other players' colors.

        • maxPoints

          java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> maxPoints
          The maximum number of points other players can get by killing a player.

        • numOfActions

          int numOfActions

        • stepsBeforeGrabbing

          int stepsBeforeGrabbing

        • stepsBeforeShooting

          int stepsBeforeShooting

        • stepsOfMovement

          int stepsOfMovement
          These attributes are what characterize the action of a player during its turn.

      • Serialized Fields

        • ammos

          java.util.EnumMap<AmmoColor,​java.lang.Integer> ammos
          Keeps track of how many cubes (called ammos) the player has, without counting powerups' cubes.

          java.util.ArrayList<Powerup> powerups
          Keeps track of which powerups the player has and can use.

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.networking.WaitingRoom extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • isRunning

          boolean isRunning
          Boolean variable, true when the countdown has started, otherwise it is false.

        • maximumNumberOfPlayers

          int maximumNumberOfPlayers
          The maximum number of users needed to create a game

        • minimumNumberOfPlayers

          int minimumNumberOfPlayers
          The minimum number of users needed to create a game

        • observer

          WaitingRoomObserver observer
          The observer Server, notified when a new game can be started

        • timeout

          long timeout
          The time to wait before notifying the observer, in seconds

        • userQueue

          java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentLinkedQueue<User> userQueue
          The concurrent collection of users in queue, waiting to start a new game

        • userWaitingList

          java.util.LinkedList<User> userWaitingList
          A helper collection of users needed to create one game at time with max maximumNumberOfPlayers players
